byline.contributor: Dr. Ellen D. Feld is an internist who teaches at Drexel University.

abstract: Dr Ellen D Feld Cases column discusses disheartening role of survival statistics during process of breast cancer diagnosis.
snippet: At each step of a breast cancer diagnosis, life by the numbers.
lead_paragraph: At each step of a breast cancer diagnosis, life by the numbers.

headline.main: Finding Little Comfort in the Statistics of Survival
headline.print_headline: Finding Little Comfort in the Statistics of Survival
headline.seo: A Cancer Patient Finds Little Comfort in Statistics of Survival
